name: SIVAN
description:
IMPORTANT NOTE:

 I couldn't fix the resolution in time for the submission, so it might be too big on this site. Playing full screen fixes it but leaves a blue rectangle on the side. Sadly, this is the best solution for now for people who don't want to download the game.

(If you have a Mac, you can download for the perfect resolution (1166X986))

(Also added the project files for non-Mac users so you could run it on your own machine - although its NOT an exe).

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

SIVAN:

Choosing a character doesn't change the game at all. But it does change the player.

You can choose out of 5 characters - which all behave the same and play the same level.

The only thing that changes is the player who controls the character. (And that might change the gameplay and the difficulty of the same level).

The upper screen is the play former, while the lower screen shows the player playing, and what he experiences within the gaming time limit.

Each of them plays on their own, but finish the level with all five characters to see how they're all connected and explore each own's story.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

A few more things:

*amount of time pressing jump will change the velocity of the jump.

*The last level CAN BE COMPLETED. Pay attention to the dialog and be creative.

Hope you enjoyed the game! If you've reached so far, I would love you to leave a feedback as I made this game completely on my own and all kind of feedback is appreciated!
